org.aludratest.testcase.data

Class TestCaseData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.testcase.data.TestCaseData

  • public final class TestCaseData
extends Object
    Represents the data for a single invocation of a method of a test class. Conceptually spoken, a concrete instance of this class is the "test case". More formally, the combination of a test method M and a TestCaseData object D makes up the test case T: T = (M, D) or T = M(D).
    Author:
    falbrech

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a new TestCaseData object.

      TestCaseData(String id, String description, Data[] data, boolean ignored, String ignoredReason)
      Constructs a new TestCaseData object.
      TestCaseData(String id, String description, TestDataSource dataSource, boolean ignored, String ignoredReason)
      Constructs a new TestCaseData object, suitable for deferred data evaluation (if supported by TestDataProvider).
      TestCaseData(String id, Throwable exception)
      Constructs a new TestCaseData object, for a dataset which could not be loaded for a given reason.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestCaseData

        public TestCaseData(String id,
                    String description,
                    Data[] data)
        Constructs a new TestCaseData object.
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the test case data. Must be not null and unique within all datasets for the same test method (this will be checked by the framework before test invocation).
        description - Description for the test case data. May be null.
        data - The array of parameters for the test method to use for a single test invocation. May be null if the method does not require any parameters. Otherwise, it must have as many entries as the method has parameters.

      • TestCaseData

        public TestCaseData(String id,
                    String description,
                    Data[] data,
                    boolean ignored)
        Constructs a new TestCaseData object.
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the test case data. Must be not null and unique within all datasets for the same test method (this will be checked by the framework before test invocation).
        description - Description for the test case data. May be null.
        data - The array of parameters for the test method to use for a single test invocation. May be null if the method does not require any parameters. Otherwise, it must have as many entries as the method has parameters.
        ignored - If true, marks this data set as ignored, i.e. this test case shall not be invoked (this behaviour can be disabled by Framework settings).

      • TestCaseData

        public TestCaseData(String id,
                    String description,
                    Data[] data,
                    boolean ignored,
                    String ignoredReason)
        Constructs a new TestCaseData object.
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the test case data. Must be not null and unique within all datasets for the same test method (this will be checked by the framework before test invocation).
        description - Description for the test case data. May be null.
        data - The array of parameters for the test method to use for a single test invocation. May be null if the method does not require any parameters. Otherwise, it must have as many entries as the method has parameters.
        ignored - If true, marks this data set as ignored, i.e. this test case shall not be invoked (this behaviour can be disabled by Framework settings).
        ignoredReason - A text describing why this data set has been marked as ignored.

      • TestCaseData

        public TestCaseData(String id,
                    String description,
                    TestDataSource dataSource,
                    boolean ignored,
                    String ignoredReason)
        Constructs a new TestCaseData object, suitable for deferred data evaluation (if supported by TestDataProvider).
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the test case data. Must be not null and unique within all datasets for the same test method (this will be checked by the framework before test invocation).
        description - Description for the test case data. May be null.
        dataSource - The data source for an array of parameters for the test method to use for a single test invocation. The source's getData() method may return null if the method does not require any parameters. Otherwise, it must have as many entries as the method has parameters.
        ignored - If true, marks this data set as ignored, i.e. this test case shall not be invoked (this behaviour can be disabled by Framework settings).
        ignoredReason - A text describing why this data set has been marked as ignored.

      • TestCaseData

        public TestCaseData(String id,
                    Throwable exception)
        Constructs a new TestCaseData object, for a dataset which could not be loaded for a given reason.
        Parameters:
        id - ID for the test case data. Must be not null and unique within all datasets for the same test method (this will be checked by the framework before test invocation).
        exception - The cause why the data for this dataset could not be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Returns a unique ID for this test case dataset (unique within the parent test suite, represented by the test class). Can also contain a short description, e.g. A3456_max_length_for_street. Should not contain space characters!
        Returns:
        A unique ID for this test case dataset, never null.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Returns a textual description for this test case dataset. May be null if no description is available.
        Returns:
        A textual description for this test case dataset, or null.

      • getData

        public Data[] getData()
        Returns the data elements for this test case, in the order of the parameter list of the test case method. May be an empty array if the test case method does not require any parameters. Otherwise, it must have as many entries as the method's parameter list.
        Returns:
        The data elements for this test case, maybe empty, but never null.

      • isIgnored

        public boolean isIgnored()
        Returns true if this dataset should not be tested, but skipped.
        Returns:
        true if this dataset should not be tested, but skipped, false otherwise.

      • getIgnoredReason

        public String getIgnoredReason()
        Returns the optional reason why this dataset has been marked as ignored.
        Returns:
        The optional reason why this dataset has been marked as ignored, or null.

      • getException

        public Throwable getException()
        Returns an exception that describes why this dataset could not be loaded. If null is returned, the dataset could be loaded successfully.
        Returns:
        null, or an exception that describes why this dataset could not be loaded.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
